CustomField.description: Formula-calculated SLA status based on target date and current stage.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( SLATargetDate__c ), "", IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( StageNamePk__c, "Done" ), ISPICKVAL( StageNamePk__c, "Cancelled" ), ISPICKVAL( StageNamePk__c, "Deployed to Prod" ) ), "Met", IF( SLATargetDate__c < TODAY(), "Breached", IF( ( SLATargetDate__c - TODAY() ) <= 2, "At Risk", "On Track" ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically calculated: On Track, At Risk (within 2 days), Breached (past due), or Met (terminal stage).
CustomField.label: SLA Status
